text.headline:
Welcome to my
Work History Timeline
text.text: This is Streamlit Timeline component to demonstrate my work history.

text.headline: Academic Award Teacher
text.text:
• Deliver high-quality instruction in data science and analytics, focusing on practical applications and real-world problem-solving.
  • Mentor students in advanced topics such as machine learning, statistical modeling, and data visualization.
  • Develop and update course materials to reflect the latest trends and technologies in data science and AI.

text.headline: Data Analytics Instructor
text.text:
• Lead immersive data analytics bootcamps, teaching students essential skills in Python, SQL, and data visualization tools.
  • Facilitate hands-on projects and case studies to help students apply theoretical knowledge to real-world datasets.
  • Provide career coaching and support to students, helping them transition into data-driven roles in various industries.

text.headline: Advanced Analytics Course Facilitator
text.text:
• Design and lead interactive advanced analytics courses with live sessions, comprehensive materials, and personalized feedback.
  • Guide students through data analysis concepts and sought-after analytics skills using a learner-focused approach.
  • Incorporate teaching content related to data science and machine learning, including Python, statistical analysis, and data analysis.

text.headline: Data Scientist & NLP Developer
text.text:
• Designed and deployed NLP modules for validating Behaviour Support Plans using AWS SageMaker.
  • Contributed to an AI-based Learning Management system providing feedback to NDIS practitioners.
  • Collaborated with researchers on an AI product for NDIS trials.

text.headline: Senior Data Scientist
text.text:
• Migrated ML models from SAS to Python/R and built churn reduction models.
  • Personalized insurance products with data science and Next Best Offer models.
  • Productionized ML pipelines on Microsoft Azure.

text.headline: Data Scientist
text.text:
• Developed AI and ML models to improve the Deakin Genie chatbot using AWS SageMaker.
  • Analyzed and deployed models predicting student attrition using Spark and AWS.
  • Implemented a Topic Recommender System based on Event Stream Processing.

text.headline: Data Scientist
text.text:
• Developed predictive models for student withdrawal and progression.
  • Built data pipelines for learning analytics.
  • Created Docker models for anonymization, testing, and QA.

text.headline: NLP Engineer
text.text:
• Developed NLP models for user profiling, using deep learning and ML to predict gender, jobs, and life events from social media.
  • Created Docker-based pipelines for aggregating, processing, and analyzing large volumes of unstructured data.

media.caption: University of Wolverhampton, West Midlands, UK

text.headline: Research Assistant
text.text:
• Analyzed Twitter data for traffic forecasting as part of the EU OPTIMUM project.
  • Used NLP and ML to identify relevant tweets and sentiments about UK traffic.

text.headline: Senior Data Scientist
text.text:
• Analyzed social media to identify insights for corporate sustainability.
  • Lead projects uncovering sustainability topics from Twitter.
  • Built products to stream and analyze real-time social media.

media.caption: Higher Colleges of Technology, Dubai, UAE

text.headline: IT Faculty
text.text: • Taught IT courses using student-centered and online learning approaches.

text.headline: Research Fellow
text.text:
• Developed semantic ML models to derive user profiles from social media.
  • Created ML approaches to improve collaboration and group decisions.

text.headline: Data Analyst & Data Miner
text.text:
• Applied data mining to design and develop recommendation systems.
  • Extensive data mining programming using SQL Server, TSQL and DMX.

text.headline: Java Programming Lab Demonstrator
text.text:
• Assisted students during Java lab sessions.
  • Provided troubleshooting for Java programming assignments.
  • Helped enhance curriculum and lab materials.

media.caption: Emirates College of Technology, Abu Dhabi

text.headline: IT Faculty Coordinator & Instructor
text.text:
• Taught a variety of IT courses over 10 semesters.
  • Led curriculum development and authored new programs.
